questions.question: What is the dominant color of the fabric covering the entire product?
What is the overall shape of the main body of the product, disregarding the flaps?
What is the apparent texture of the fabric, as suggested by its visual appearance?
Considering the edges, what kind of stitching is visibly present around the perimeter?
What seems to be the fabric's primary function, indicated by its visual properties?
Based on the image, how many flaps are visible on the item for tucking in?
What is the apparent material that constitutes the bulk of the product?
Regarding the design, does the product showcase any prominent patterns or prints?
Judging by its appearance, how would you characterize the overall feel of the material?
What is the overall visual impression of the product's structure, solid or flimsy?
Judging from visual details, is the material of the product evidently thick or thin?
What is the apparent function of the two visible flaps on either side?
Does the product exhibit any noticeable visible seams beyond the perimeter?
Based solely on its visual appearance, how would you describe its manufacturing quality?
What is the implied purpose based on the visual structure and material?
